data.text: @gillgeorge01 Vote Tory, get ignored (unless you've got plenty of roubles)!
@jono_pce @gillgeorge01 @Dunne4Ludlow Quaite. My dear, it was too, too non-u.

@jono_pce @gillgeorge01 @Dunne4Ludlow He "doesn't believe in ambulance hubs", eh?

Of course not, he wouldn't be seen dead in one - quite literally.

@jono_pce @gillgeorge01 @Dunne4Ludlow ... His website describes him as a "local farmer" - he "farms" his ancestral 2,500 acre estate, Gatley Park and I doubt he has ever sat in a tractor in his life. https://t.co/oRLX1etszU

@jono_pce @gillgeorge01 @Dunne4Ludlow Dunne owns not one but two of the Georgian houses on Ludlow's famous Broad Street, just down the road from the Conservative Club.

He doesn't live in either of them; in fact he lives out of the constituency in Herefordshire...

@bilbatch @gillgeorge01 Honestly what do expect from a Tory like @Dunne4Ludlow ? He is the same as all the rest of them, only interested in lining his pockets with cash and doing as little as possible for that. Vote him out next time, he becomes valueless then.

@gillgeorge01 Your reminder that Philip Dunne's sister Camilla is married to the CEO of Serco; she donated £5k to him last year. 

Dunne's phone number and address were in Jeffrey Epstein's Little Black Book.

@gillgeorge01 Yet at the next election Ludlow voters will inevitably tick the box marked Tory like Pavlov's dogs - voting for more inequality, elitism and corruption. 

Our country is genuinely insane.
